CustomField.formula: IF(AND(NOT(ISNULL(NEILON__Size__c)), NEILON__Size__c != 0), TEXT( IF(FLOOR( LOG(NEILON__Size__c) / LOG(1024)) == 0, NEILON__Size__c, IF(FLOOR( LOG(NEILON__Size__c)/LOG(1024)) == 1, ROUND(NEILON__Size__c/1024, 2), IF(FLOOR(LOG(NEILON__Size__c)/LOG(1024)) == 2, ROUND(NEILON__Size__c/(1024*1024), 2), IF(FLOOR(LOG(NEILON__Size__c)/LOG(1024)) == 3, ROUND(NEILON__Size__c/(1024*1024*1024), 2), ROUND(NEILON__Size__c/(1024*1024*1024*1024), 2)))))) & " " & IF(FLOOR(LOG(NEILON__Size__c)/LOG(1024)) == 0, "B", IF(FLOOR(LOG(NEILON__Size__c)/LOG(1024)) == 1, "KB", IF(FLOOR(LOG(NEILON__Size__c)/LOG(1024)) == 2, "MB", IF(FLOOR(LOG(NEILON__Size__c)/LOG(1024)) == 3, "GB", "TB")))), "0 B")
CustomField.label: Size
